Articles.Content: ive just tried to load KSP for the first time in a while and looking forward to getting back to grips with it again. However i cant seem to get past first loading screen, the progress bar is full and all it says is "Loading expansions..."! ive been starting at this screen now for a good 20mins but nothing is happening. Help Please thanks in advance
